text: 2|262|evarkal tankal porulkalai allahvutaiya pataiyil celavu ceytu (apporulai vankiyavanukkut) tankal ataik kotuttatarkaka ikalcciyaiyum, tunpattaiyum (atanotu) cerkkavillaiyo avarkalukkuriya kuli avarkalin iraivanitam avarkalukkuntu. Melum, avarkalukku oru payamumillai; avarkal tukkappatavum mattarkal
